meanings.definition: A class of drugs used to treat high blood pressure and chest pain.
meanings.sent1: Doctors often prescribe diltiazems for patients with high blood pressure.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacist explained how diltiazems can help with chest pain.
meanings.sent3: When the diltiazems kicked in, the patient felt relief from the chest pain.
meanings.sent4: The diltiazems acted like a shield, protecting the heart from high blood pressure.
meanings.sent5: The bottle of diltiazems was a lifesaver for those with chest pain.

meanings.definition: The generic name for a specific medication used to treat hypertension and angina.
meanings.sent1: My doctor switched my medication to diltiazems for my hypertension.
meanings.sent2: She always carries her diltiazems in case of an angina attack.
meanings.sent3: The diltiazems danced in her purse, ready to tackle any angina symptoms.
meanings.sent4: His daily dose of diltiazems was like a guardian against hypertension.
meanings.sent5: The effectiveness of diltiazems in treating angina was well-known in the medical community.
